description: Sent by TimeCoordinators to coordinate time. For simulated actors, time progresses discretely on receipt of these time steps.

ReasonableUnixTimeS.description: Integer reflecting unix time seconds between 1970 and 3000

UuidCanonicalTextual.description: A string of hex words separated by hyphens of length 8-4-4-4-12.

LeftRightDot.description: Lowercase alphanumeric words separated by periods, most significant word (on the left) starting with an alphabet character.

ReasonableUnixTimeMs.description: An integer reflecting unix time in ms between midnight Jan 1 2000 and midnight Jan 1 3000 UTC

FromGNodeAlias.title: The GNodeAlias of the sender
FromGNodeAlias.description: The sender should always be a GNode Actor of role TimeCoordinator.

TimestepCreatedMs.title: The real time created, in unix milliseconds
